div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1519 Beirut (anc. Berytus), 1964 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 27+ AR Alexander III: 19 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 4, Sidon 1, Baby- lon 11, Alexandreia 1, Aradus 1, Berytus 1) Philip III: 7 tetradr. (unc. mint) Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (unc. mint) Disposition: dispersed Information from MÃ¼nzen and Medaillen, Basel
